item.title: Mysql Config Server.conf
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: 压缩binlog空间 在运行前, 先去数据目录文件夹下查看一下, mysql.000001的文件有多少,并看一下各文件的创建时间.也就是确认一下要

item.title: Mysql Config
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: MySQL5.7初始密码查看及重置 1 2 3 [root@localhost jlch]# grep 'temporary password' /var/log/mysqld.log 2018-02-12T07:28:21.362804Z 1 [Note] A temporary password is generated for root@localhost: Ngu97xLjPL(S [root@localhost jlch]# MySQL源码安装、配置、初始化及启动 1 mysql_secure_installation 配置mysql允许远
